entities.description: Arguments or problems with family or friends caused or made worse by heroin use in the past 12 months.
Continued heroin use despite arguments or problems with family or friends in the past 12 months.
Situations where heroin use increased the chance of getting physically hurt in the past 12 months.
Withdrawal symptoms experienced after reducing or stopping heroin use in the past 12 months.
Feeling blue or down as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates heroin use to causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Relates heroin use to continued use despite causing arguments or problems with family or friends.
Relates heroin use to an increased chance of getting physically hurt.
Relates heroin use to experiencing withdrawal symptoms after reducing or stopping use.
Relates heroin withdrawal symptoms to feeling blue or down.
